name: I'm a Vet
description:
I'm a Vet invites you to play as a veterinary, not for ordinary animals but for fantastic creatures that need your help!

Heal them by playing cute mini games and be sure they come home cured and happy!

Controls
Mini games can be resolved by using your mouse (Click, drag) and arrow keys.

Development context

I'm a Vet is a very short game (~5min) I made all by myself during less than 1 month, on my free time. My main goal was to see if I was able to make an interactive story alone.
The game was developped on Clickteam Fusion.

You'll find the full version (with animated videos) that is pretty heavy, or a Light version with no intro/outro.

Credits

- Jeanne Prigent : Game Design, Art, Code

- Thomas Garcia ( Twitter ) : Music

Special thanks to Thomas and Lisa, that were my lovely playtesters. I love you guys !

Follow me on Twitter to see my work and to have updates about my game dev adventure : Twitter
